items.description: You can find it at the entrance to the Ravenclaw Tower from the Grand Staircase - or by going East from the Ravenclaw Tower Floo Flame.

items.name: Entrance Hall Exterior Statue
items.description: Travel from the Entrance Hall in the Great Hall building to go outside, and then head East under the stone awning to find a statue in the corner. Use Levioso on the orb to raise it, and you can collect the page.

items.name: Entrance Hall Interior Statue
items.description: From the Grand Staircase, enter the Entrance Hall to the left and look along the East Wall for a statue holding an orb. You can use Levioso on it to raise the orb and collect the page.

items.name: Restricted Section Statue
items.description: It is located in the Restricted Section of the Library, which you can only gain access to when undertaking a main quest with Sebastian Sallow. After sneaking down to the lower floors past the ghosts, you’ll enter a storage room, and the statue can be found down the stairs.

items.name: Central Hall Statue
items.description: Once you can unlock doors, head Northeast from the Central Hall statue to look right from the door to the Greenhouses and you’ll spot a level 1 locked door. Once unlocked, enter to find a chest and a statue you can use Levioso on to reveal a Field Guide Page.

items.name: Quad Statue
items.description: Though listed in the South Wing, you can actually find it at the edge of the outdoor Quad area between the Grand Staircase and Great Hall. It’s easiest to reach either from the Quad Courtyard Floo Flame and traveling South against the higher walkway.

items.name: Clock Tower Statue
items.description: You can find it right next to the Clock Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, in a small section full of junk off on the right to the main inner courtyard.

items.name: Hospital Wing Statue
items.description: After completing Mr. Moon’s quest and gaining access to the Faculty Tower, climb up to the very top of the staircase to find a statue on the landing across from the statue of Boris, and use Levioso to reveal the page.

items.name: Hengist of Woodcroft
items.description: This page is right next to the North Hogsmeade floo flame. Head slightly south from the floo flame to find the statue of Hengist. Cast Revelio in front of it to reveal the page.

items.name: Scrivenshaft Cats
items.description: While facing the statue of Hengist, turn left and go into the blue building you see. Inside, you’ll find a back area that has two cats. The field guide page is in the archway of the backroom.

items.name: Honeydukes
items.description: From Scribenshaft Cats, turn left and head back towards the statue. Across from it, you’ll find the sweets shop, Honeydukes. The field guide page is right at the front door on the outside of the building.

items.name: Fizzing Whizbees
items.description: In honeydukes on the left side of the entrance in front of the Fizzing Whizzbees display

items.name: Exploding Bon Bons
items.description: Next, head into Honeydukes and you’ll find the next page on the north side of the building next to the pot of gold.

items.name: Tea Shop Decor
items.description: Exit Honeydukes and head across the street to Steepley & Sons. Go through the front door and turn left. You’ll find the next page near the table that’s against the green wall.

items.name: Magical Mail
items.description: Exit the tea shop and turn left to find the post office. You’ll find the next page inside the post office between the blue shelves.

items.name: Dogweed And Deathcap Tree
items.description: The next one is across the river, on the northwestern side of Hogsmeade. Head across the bridge near Brood and Peck, and make your way up the hill towards Dogweed And Deathcap. You’ll find the page inside, next to the tree.

items.name: Abandoned Shop
items.description: From Dogweed And Deathcap, head down the road moving south. As you make your way down the road, you’ll see another building up another road to your right. The page is in front of The Old Fool abandoned shop.

items.name: Brood and Peck
items.description: Enter Brood and Peck. You'll find the page to the right of Ellie's desk

items.name: Near the Old Fool
items.description: You likely saw this first page as you were navigating to the Abandoned Shop Revelio page. It will be flying around near The Old Fool.

items.name: Above Dogweed And Deathcap
items.description: Head back to Dogweed and Deathcap, and you’ll find this Accio page flying around the top of the building. If you are having trouble getting it, you can climb up to the cliffs behind the building to get a better angle.

items.name: Near The Water Mill
items.description: From Dogweed And Deathcap, head down the path and take a left at the fork. Head up this path towards the water mill, and you’ll find the page flying around nearby.

items.name: Brood and Peck
items.description: Head back down the hill and make your way across the bridge near Brood and Peck. You’ll find the next page flying over the bridge.

items.name: Behind Steeply & Sons
items.description: Make your way back towards Hogsmeade Square and head between the buildings to the right of Steeply & Sons. You’ll find the page flying around near the cliff behind the building.

items.name: Northernmost Cliffs
items.description: Head back to Hogsmeade Square, and follow the path north towards the unnamed buildings above Honeydukes. You’ll find the page flying around near the cliffs.

items.name: Behind Brood And Peck
items.description: Head to the alley south of Brood and Peck entrance, you'll find it flying between the shop and a house

items.name: Over Water Mill Pond
items.description: From Brood and Peck look towards teh Water Mill and it will be flying over the water

items.name: Dogweed And Deathcap
items.description: Inside the Dogweed And Deathcap shop, you’ll find a moth mirror. After casting Lumos in front of the mirror, head out of the shop and up cliffs behind it to find the moth on the edge of the chimney.

items.name: The Old Fool
items.description: Inside the Old Fool abandoned shop, you’ll find the moth mirror hung on the center wall. Exit the shop, turn left, and head around to the back of the building. The moth will be on a box near a pine tree.

items.name: Water Mill
items.description: North of Hogsmeade Square, you’ll find a building with a water mill connected. Go inside the building and you’ll find the mirror on the ground to your left. Exit the way you came, and you’ll find the moth perched on a lamp next to the nearest house slightly down the hill.

items.name: The Three Broomsticks Private Room
items.description: Head all the way up the stairs in the Three Broomsticks. Unlock the Level 2 lock and enter the room

items.name: The Three Broomsticks
items.description: Enter the bar through the main entrance, and you’ll see a fireplace on the far side of the room. You’ll find the Revelio page just in front of the fireplace.

items.name: Butterbeer Barrels
items.description: Head outside The Three Broomsticks and make your way around to the eastern side of the building. Here you’ll find some large butterbeer barrels, and the guide page will be in front of them.

items.name: Ceridwen’s Precarious Cauldrons
items.description: In front of Tomes and Scrolls you'll find Ceridwen's Cauldrons. The field guide page is near the stack of cauldrons next to the front door.

items.name: Ollivander’s Wand Shop
items.description: Navigate to the front door of Ollivander’s Wand Shop. Cast Revelio near the door to reveal the guide page.

items.name: Hogsmeade
items.description: This is the first one you have access to when you initially arrive in Hogsmeade. You’ll find the guide page at the base of the bridge you take to enter the town.

items.name: Spintwitches Sporting Needs
items.description: This field guide page isn’t initially available when you arrive in Hogsmeade. You’ll need to take your first broom flying class, which is a few chapters into the main story. After doing so, the broom shop will be unlocked. Head through the front door and the page will be immediately on your left.

items.name: Enchanted Staircase
items.description: Enter Tomes and Scrolls, the page will be to the left near the front window.

items.name: Southern Garden
items.description: Make your way southeast from the South Hogsmeade floo flame. The page is flying around near a group of trees in a gated garden.

items.name: Tomes And Scrolls Shop
items.description: Head inside the shop and you’ll find a box on a table that you can interact with. After doing so, a staircase will assemble. Take that up to the second floor, and you’ll find the page flying around.

items.name: Outside The Tomes Shop
items.description: After exiting the shop, turn around and face the front door. You’ll see the page flying around to the left of it.

items.name: Pink Leaved Tree
items.description: Now turn around so that your back is to the shop entrance, and head across the street between the buildings, heading in an eastward direction. You’ll find it flying around a pink-leaved tree.

items.name: Northwest Of The Tomes Shop
items.description: Head back to the tomes shop and make your way down the adjacent street. Move northwest until you can see Hogwarts in the distance. You’ll see the page flying around in the open.

items.name: Next To The Three Broomsticks
items.description: Make your way to the outside of The Three Broomsticks. You’ll find the page flying between the bar and the locked building next to it.

items.name: Alley By Tomes and Scrolls
items.description: Behind houses across from Tomes and Scrolls

items.name: Southern Moth Mirror
items.description: From the South Hogsmeade floo flame, head up the road moving north. The mirror will be perched against a wall on the back of a building. From the mirror, turn around and head down a small staircase, moving left around the back of the building. The moth will be near a locked eye-chest, perched on a short pillar. Return it to the mirror and claim your guide page.

items.name: Gladrags Wizardwear
items.description: Head to Hogsmeade Square and make your way across the street to Gladrags Wizardwear. You’ll find the page near the front door entrance.

items.name: Gladrags Mannequin
items.description: Head into the shop through the front door. You’ll see the owner to your left, and to your right will be a mannequin bust. The page is right in front of the mannequin.

items.name: Sneakoscope
items.description: The next one is in the same building, on the other side of the clothing shop. Head down the steps and you’ll find the next page in front of a desk near a skeleton.

items.name: Zonko’s Joke Shop
items.description: Make your way to the front entrance of the joke shop. Cast Revelio and you’ll find the guide page by the main entrance, near the butterbeer barrels.

items.name: Frog Spawn Soap
items.description: Next, head inside Zonko’s Joke Shop. The first Revelio page is on the bottom floor next to a tiny stage with a curtain.

items.name: Dungbomb
items.description: After grabbing the Frog Spawn Soap, head up to the second floor. You’ll find the next page in the back near the railing that overlooks the first floor.

items.name: Water Well
items.description: Make your way to the center of town. In the middle of the street, positioned between Madam Snelling’s Tress Emporium and Gladrags Wizardwear, you’ll find a well. Cast Revelio near the well to reveal the hidden page.

items.name: Hogsmeade Community Garden
items.description: Navigate to the West Hogsmeade floo flame. From there, head southeast until you find the garden on a small hill. Head through the small gate and the page will be in front of a bean-like plant.

items.name: J. Pippin’s Potions
items.description: Unlike most of the other shops, there isn’t a guide page outside of J. Pippin’s Potions. Instead, head inside and you’ll find it near the potions behind the shopkeeper.

items.name: Mounted Hog’s Head
items.description: South of the West Hogsmeade Floo Flame, you’ll find the Hog’s Head pub. Go inside and the page will be behind the bartender.

items.name: Hog’s Head Docks
items.description: Exit the pub from the back entrance, and turn to your right. You’ll find the next page by the docks, facing west.

items.name: The Magic Neep Cart
items.description: Head across the bridge near the West Hogsmeade floo flame. The next page will be in front of the Neep Cart, next to Timothy Teasdale.

items.name: Above The Magic Neep
items.description: As you are approaching the shop, look up above the shop, and you’ll find it flying around near the roof.

items.name: Behind Hog’s Head Pub
items.description: Make your way back to Hog’s Head Pub. Outside, in the back where you found the Revelio page, you’ll see the next page flying around over the river to the west.

items.name: Between Two Houses
items.description: From J. Pippin’s Potions, head north up the street. At the bend, you’ll see the page flying between two houses.

items.name: Between Two Shops
items.description: From Hogsmeade Square, make your way toward Madam Snellins Tress Emporium. You’ll find the next one between her shop and Gladrags Wizardwear.

items.name: Near the Western Cliffs
items.description: From The Magic Neep head west along the path, you'll see this page hovering around the cliffs just north of the house by Magic Neep

items.name: Behind Hog’s Head
items.description: To find the mirror, make your way to the back area of Hog’s Head. Behind the adjacent buildings, start moving in an eastward direction until you find the mirror next to the locked eye-chest. To find the moth, head back to the Hog’s Head Dock, and it will be on a box near where you found the Revelio page.

items.name: Spider Sign
items.description: Found near the Hamlet Shop by the short bridge

items.name: Antique Horn
items.description: East North Ford Bog - by a small dock in the swamp near the Battle Arena

items.name: Murtlap Tentacles
items.description: West of Central Hogwarts Valley floo flame by the river

items.name: Hebridean Black Scale
items.description: West of Central Hogwarts Valley Floo Flame by a small camp

items.name: Enchanted Scarecrow
items.description: Found inside a small farm between two houses, west of Brocburrow Floo

items.name: Lace Doily
items.description: West of Keenbridge behind an abandoned building infront of a tree. Look for Ancient Magic Hotspot

items.name: Doxy Egg
items.description: Northwest of Northern South Sea Bog Floo Flame inside a Small Bandit Camp

items.name: Ginger Root
items.description: Keenbridge, near Floo on the bar of the outside Tavern.

items.name: The Tilted House
items.description: Keen bridge, huge house with the tree sticking out the top.

items.name: Beehives
items.description: From Keenbridge Floo flame, head south. Hard to miss.

items.name: Giant Shade Tree
items.description: From Cragcroft Floo flame, head northwest towards a big tree in the center of town.

items.name: Dragon Skeleton
items.description: Southwest from Cragcroft Floo flame. Near a Trial of Merlin. Watch out for enemies.

items.name: Chocolate Frogs
items.description: South of Hogsmeade, near a cliff

items.name: Squib Cottage
items.description: South of East Hogwarts Valley floo flame by a house with pumpkins

items.name: Runespoor Egg
items.description: East at the very edge of the map inside a castle

items.name: Pumpkin Fizz
items.description: From Upper Hogsfield floo flame, head north

items.name: Jewelled Brooch
items.description: East of Irondale by a windmill

items.name: Cinnamon Bark
items.description: In an underground cave inside some bandit camps in Feldcroft Catacomb over a fireplace

items.name: Lovage Bouquet
items.description: In-between a gorge just south of Feldcroft

items.name: The Feldcroft Well
items.description: At the center of Feldcroft by the well

items.name: Practice Dummies
items.description: East of Feldcroft by the training dummies

items.name: Broken Binoculars
items.description: In a small tower by the Hamlet Shop just northeast of Rookwood Castle

items.name: Peruvian Instant Darkness Powder
items.description: On top of a mountain next to a bandit camp near West Hogwarts Valley

items.name: Acromantula Venom
items.description: Northwest from Clagmar Castle Floo flame in a Bandit Camp on a hill.

items.name: Pungous Onion Bomb
items.description: West from Clagmar Castle Floo flame. Before a Bandit Camp in a gorge.

items.name: Alihotsy Fudge
items.description: Northeast of the Forbidden Forest Floo Flame by a cliff

items.name: Antique Compass
items.description: Right in front of North Poidsear Coast Floo flame

items.name: Groundskeepers Tools
items.description:
From the Hogwarts South Exit Floo Flames, head along the cobbled path and down the hill. You’ll see a small building on the way down. Go inside to find this Field Guide page.

**Note:** While this is part of the Hogwarts Revelio Collections, it counts towards the Highlands Field Guide Page count of 31

items.name: Hogsmeade Station Ticket Office
items.description: From Arranshire Floo flame, fly northward until you reach Hogsmeade Station

items.name: Spider Parts
items.description: From Aranshire Floo flame, head southeast towards a trader.

items.name: Abandoned Bothy
items.description: From Northern South Sea Bog Floo flame, fly southwards. Watch out for enemies. There should be an abandoned house nearby

items.name: Professor Fig's Classroom
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Professor Fig’s Classroom floo flame in the Astronomy Wing, and enter the door ahead of you. 
2. Go up the stairs into his office and find the Demiguise statue toward the back of the office.

items.name: Transfiguration Classroom
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Transfiguration Classroom floo flame in the Astronomy Wing.
2. Turn around and go through the doors on your left.
3. Proceed forward and go down all of the stairs on the right.
4. Go inside the door and head down even more stairs until you reach the dragon statue.
5. Turn right and find the door with a level one lock on your left.
6. Unlock the door with Alohomora, and find the Demiguise statue on your right.

items.name: Transfiguration Courtyard
items.description:
1. Use the Transfiguration Courtyard floo flame in the Astronomy Wing.
2. Turn around and enter the doors to the Defence Against the Dark Arts Tower.
3. Go right up the small set of stairs and find the door with a level two lock and two talking gargoyles on both sides of it.
4. Use Alohomora to open the door, and collect the Demiguise Moon from the statue inside.

items.name: Hogwarts North Exit
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Hogwarts North Exit floo flame located in the Bell Tower Wing.
2. Turn around and turn left as soon as you’re within castle walls.
3. Find the door with a level one lock on the right side of the stairs (don’t go up the stairs).
4. Unlock the door and head inside to find a Demiguise statue on the right.

items.name: Beasts Classroom
items.description:
1. Fast travel to the Beasts Classroom floo flame which is located in the Bell Tower Wing.
2. Turn around to find a door with a level two lock.
3. Unlock the door, and collect the Demiguise moon inside.

items.name: Divination Classroom
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Divination Classroom floo flame in the Library Annex.
2. Proceed up the stairs, and climb up the ladder that falls down.
3. Collect the Demiguise moon from the statue on Professor Onai’s desk.

items.name: Restricted Section
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Library floo flame in the Library Annex, and turn around towards the fenced area of the library.
2. Enter the fenced area, which should seem familiar from the “Secrets of the Restricted Section” quest.
3. Proceed to the bottom of the restricted section, and proceed through the rooms to find the Demiguise statue.

items.name: Potions Classroom
items.description:
1. Travel to the Potions Classroom floo flame in the Library Annex, and enter the doors ahead.
2. Go down the spiral staircase on the left, and proceed through the corridor until you find a door on the left with a level one lock.
3. Unlock the door, and head down the hallway until you find a door with a level two lock on your left.
4. Use Alohomora to open the door, and grab the Demiguise moon from the statue inside.

items.name: Great Hall
items.description:
1. Fast travel to the Great Hall floo flame in the Great Hall section of Hogwarts.
2. Move forward until you spot a door with a level one lock on your right.
3. Unlock the door using Alohomora, and get the Demiguise moon off of the table inside.

items.name: Faculty Tower
items.description:
1. Teleport to the Faculty Tower floo flame located in the South Wing.
2. Head straight ahead, and proceed down the stairs to the bottom level.
3. Continue through the corridor filled with musical paintings, and go down the stairs on the right.
4. Turn left at the corner, and walk down the hallway until you find a door on the left with a locked door with a level one lock.
5. Unlock the door and enter the middle stall to find the Demiguise statue.

items.name: Tomes and Scrolls
items.description:
1. Enter Tomes and Scrolls in Hogsmeade, and walk past Thomas Brown and the front desk.
2. Turn left into the room behind Thomas, and collect the Demiguise statue inside.

items.name: Hogsmeade Home
items.description:
1. Find the house in Hogsmeade in the alleyway near Tomes and Scrolls. This house has a level two lock and the front of the house faces northeast.
2. Unlock the door with Alohomora and enter the house.
3. Go up the stairs to find the Demiguise statue in the room on the left.

items.name: Hog's Head
items.description:
1. Go to Hog’s Head in Hogsmeade, and go inside.
2. Enter the room on the right side to find a Demiguise statue on top of some crates

items.name: House By J.Pippin's Potions
items.description:
1. Make your way to J. Pippin’s Potions, and find the house to the north of it.
2. Unlock the level two lock on the door, and enter the house.
3. Go up the stairs, and collect the Demiguise moon on top of the dresser.

items.name: Three Broomsticks
items.description:
1. Enter the Three Broomsticks in Hogsmeade, and climb the stairs all the way to the top until you reach a locked door.
2. Unlock the door and collect the Demiguise moon inside.

items.name: House by Three Broomsticks
items.description:
1. Find the house beside Hogsmeade that has a level one lock.
2. Unlock the door by using Alohomora, and head upstairs to find the Demiguise statue.

items.name: Dervish and Banges
items.description: 1. Enter Dervish and Banges, which is to the right of Gladrags Wizardwear, to immediately find a Demiguise statue on the counter.

items.name: House across from Brood and Peck
items.description:
1. Make your way to the house across from Brood and Peck, and unlock the door using Alohomora.
2. Enter the home to immediately find the Demiguise statue above the fireplace.

items.name: House behind Honeydukes
items.description:
1. Make your way to the house behind Honeydukes, and unlock the door.
2. Collect the Demiguise moon inside.

items.name: Pitt-Upon-Ford -- Northford Bog
items.description:
1. Make your way to Pitt-upon-ford, which is in North Ford Bog.
2. Travel to the floo flame, and take the path that leads south until you find a three-story house on the right.
3. Enter the house and climb up the stairs to the top where you’ll find the Demiguise statue on the floor.

items.name: Upper Hogsfield -- Hogsmeade Valley
items.description:
1. Travel to the floo flame in Upper Hogsfield, which is in the northern section of Hogsmeade Valley.
2. Follow the path that leads north to a house with a wheel beside the door.
3. Unlock the level one lock on the door to immediately find a Demiguise statue.

items.name: Aranshire -- South Hogwarts Region
items.description:
1. Travel to Aranshire, which is located on the eastern side of the South Hogwarts Region.
2. Enter the closest house to the floo flame, which has a level one lock.
3. Head upstairs to find the Demiguise statue.

items.name: Lower Hogsfield -- South Hogwarts
items.description:
1. Head to Lower Hogsfield, which is located to the south of Hogwarts in the South Hogwarts Region.
2. Enter the house with a rounded roof, which has a level one lock on the door.
3. Let the door close to find the Demiguise statue on the floor.

items.name: Brocburrow - Hogwarts Valley
items.description:
1. Travel to Brocburrow, which is located in the northeastern section of Hogwarts Valley.
2. Make your way to the center of the town, which has a well and a few market stalls.
3. Face northwest towards the two houses, and enter the house on the right that has a level one lock.
4. Find the Demiguise statue on the floor immediately to the left after entering the house.

items.name: Keenbridge - Hogwarts Valley
items.description:
1. Travel to Keenbridge, which is located around the center of Hogwarts Valley.
2. Follow the path that heads west out of Keenbridge to a house with pumpkins outside and a clothes line coming down from the roof.
3. Unlock the door with a level one lock using Alohomora, and find the Demiguise statue immediately inside.

items.name: Feldcroft -- Feldcroft Region
items.description:
1. Make your way to Feldcroft, which is located in the center of the Feldcroft region.
2. Head to the east side of the town, and find the house with a clothes line coming from the roof.
3. Enter the house to find a Demiguise statue on the window sill on the left.

items.name: Irondale -- Feldcroft Region
items.description:
1. Travel to Irondale, which is located in the southeast of the Feldcroft Region.
2. Find the house with a triangle roof and Althea Twiddle outside.
3. Head inside and search behind the counter on the right to find the Demiguise statue.

items.name: Marunweem -- Marunweem Lake
items.description:
1. Head to Marunweem, which is located in the Marunweem Lake region.
2. From the floo flame, head north and take the first right turn.
3. Follow the path to the first home you come across on the left.
4. Unlock the door using Alohomora, and find Demiguise statue behind the counter

items.name: Brainburgh -- Manor Cape
items.description:
1. Travel to the floo flame in Bainburgh, which is located in the northern section of Manor Cape.
2. Turn left when looking away from the floo flame, and head towards the house on the left.
3. Unlock the door, and collect the Demiguise moon from the statue inside.

items.name: Cragcroft -- Cragcroftshire
items.description:
1. Travel to center of Cragcroft, which is located in the eastern section of Cragcroftshire.
2. Make your way to the center of Cragcroft, which is indicated by a large tree.
3. Face northwest and move towards the house beside the vendor, Bella Navarro.
4. Head inside and go to the top floor to find a Demiguise statue.

From the Central Hall Floo Flame under the Library Annex area, go down the stairs in front of the flame and take a left by the fountain. Go down the stairs again and on your right you'll find an Arithmancy Door Puzzle. Solve it and you'll find the chest inside.

From the Bell Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, take the stairs on the left, then take a left again up the stairs and keep following this path until you reach the Music Room.
Once there, keep going upstairs past the bells until you're at the top.
Go outside the door, approach the frog statue to your right, then turn right to find the chest by the wall.
From the Ravenclaw Tower Floo Flame, walk northwest to find an Arithmancy Door Puzzle next to the spiral staircase; the chest is behind this door.

From the Grand Staircase Floo Flame in the Grand Staircase area, take the spiral staircase down on your right; at the bottom, you'll see a painting full of fruits on your left.
Tickle the pear when prompted to enter the Kitchens Room, where you'll find the chest at the east area of the room between a stack of pots and a cupboard.

Go to the Restricted Section of the Library, located east of the Library Floo Flame. Keep going downstairs, passing through many cages and rooms, until you reach a door at the end of the path. In this messy room, you'll find the chest next to a blue lamp.

From the Faculty Tower Floo Flame, walk to the hall southwest into the Faculty Tower, and keep going until you reach the spiral staircase at the end of the hall.
Go downstairs and immediately turn left at the end to find a Frog Statue. Enter the statue and you'll find the chest in front of you by the table.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Grass Biome: Head north immediately after entering this biome.You will find the first box after you have crossed two elevation levels in this general direction.
From the Charms Classroom Floo Flame go south, then turn left and you'll see an Arithmancy Door Puzzle on your left. Unlock it and you'll find the chest inside next to the door.

From the Bell Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, take the stairs on the left, then take a left again up the stairs and keep following this path until you reach the Music Room.
Once there, keep going upstairs up past the bells until you're at the top.
Go outside the door, enter the frog statue to your right, and you'll find the chest in front of you by the wall

From the Grand Staircase Floo Flame, walk up the stairs due northeast, then go up another set of stairs past the architect statue, until you're a floor above the Floo Flame. You'll find the chest behind the Arithmancy Door Puzzle by the bend walking forward from the stairs (the second '??' for this puzzle is downstairs just by the Floo Flame).
From the Great Hall Floo Flame, take a left towards the fireplace and a left again down the hall into an Arithmancy Door Puzzle. Solve it and you'll find the chest on your left by the window.

From the Bell Tower Courtyard Floo Flame in the Bell Tower Wing area, enter the Level 1 Locked Door beside the Floo Flame.
Then, take the stairs down and take a right. Solve the Arithmancy Door Puzzle and you'll find the chest behind the Gorgon Portrait.

From the Clock Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, unlock the Level 1 Locked Door at the south corner of the room, and go up the stairs to the second floor of the Clock Tower.
Use Arresto Momentum or Glacius to align the two-headed dragon figure to unlock the door with the chest at the end of the second floor hallway.
There are two chests in this room; this one is on the floor by the wall.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Grass Biome: Go back to where you started in this biome and then head southwards towards the trail beside the big rock. Follow this trail to the end and jump onto the area below it to find the second Vivarium chest in Hogwarts Legacy.

Facing away from the Transfiguration Courtyard Floo Flame, enter the door to the right to enter the Defense Against the Dark Arts Tower. Upon entry, go west towards the Level 2 Locked Door between some gargoyles. Inside the room, you'll find the chest at the end of the table.

From the Bell Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, take the stairs on the left, then take a left again up the stairs and keep following this path until you reach the Music Room.
Once there, keep going upstairs up past the bells until you're at the top.
Go outside the door, enter the frog statue to your right, walk to the left path, then turn right at the corner and you'll find the chest by the wall.
From the Grand Staircase Tower Floo Flame, go west to the moving staircases, and keep going down until you come across an Arithmancy Door Puzzle; the chest is behind this door.
From the Great Hall Floo Flame, go towards the southwest corner of the hall and find the Level 1 Locked Door. Unlock it and you'll find the chest on your left on top of a small table.

From the Divination Classroom Floo Flame, go to the entrance beside the Floo Flame.
Pass through the wooden hall, taking a right as soon as you can to find an Arithmancy Door Puzzle. Behind this door is the Arithmancy Classroom; you'll find the chest in front of you as you enter.

From the Clock Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, unlock the Level 1 Locked Door at the south corner of the room, and go up the stairs to the second floor of the Clock Tower.
Use Arresto Momentum or Glacius to align the two-headed dragon figure to unlock the door with the chest at the end of the second floor hallway.
There are two chests in this room; this one is on the drawer by the window.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Grass Biome: Drop further down from where you found the second chest, and you will find a cave to your left. Inside this cave, you'll find the third Vivarium chest.

From the Charms Classroom Floo Flame, go down the stairs northeast, and enter the Charms Classroom to your right. Take the stairs up on your left and enter Professor Ronen's Office. Once inside, take the spiral staircase up and you'll find the chest outside by the wall.

From the Transfiguration Classroom Floo Flame, turn northeast and enter the first door to the left. Go forward then turn right, then go upstairs until you reach a Level 1 Locked Door. Inside the room behind this door, there is an Arithmancy Puzzle Door with the chest inside.

From the Trophy Room Floo Flame, go northwest and follow this curved path until you see a gate with a Level 1 Lock.
Enter it and keep following the path up; through a spiral staircase, a hallway, and another spiral staircase.
At the end of this staircase is a door; upon entering it, turn right and you will find a locked door, which you can only unlock with the Key of Admittance, obtainable from one of the hidden Hogwarts secrets. The chest is inside this locked room, next to a table.

From the Divination Classroom Floo Flame, go to the entrance beside the Floo Flame.
Pass through the wooden hall, taking a right as soon as you can to find an Arithmancy Door Puzzle.
Behind this door is the Arithmancy Classroom; pass through the hall and into the door to get to the actual classroom, then turn left to the southeast part of the room to another Arithmancy Door Puzzle. The chest is behind this door.

From the Clock Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, look up to the pendulum in the room and use Arresto Momentum or Glacius when it is aligned with the horse symbol.
This will unlock the door with the horse mural at the east side of the room; the chest is behind this door.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Dark Biome: You have to take a U-turn as soon as you enter the dark biome and head towards the light. Once you reach there, climb up the ledge on that piece of land to find the first chest.
From the Professor Fig's Classroom Floo Flame, enter Professor Fig's Classroom and you'll find the chest to your left by the corner of the room on a table.

From the Hogwarts North Exit Floo Flame, turn right to inside of the castle walls, then turn right and walk along the wall until you reach the shed with Thestrals, with a stone room beside it.
Go around this stone structure to find the Level 2 Locked Door; the chest is behind this door.

From the Trophy Room Floo Flame, go northwest and follow this curved path until you see a gate with a Level 1 Lock.
Enter it and keep following the path up; through a spiral staircase, a hallway, and another spiral staircase.
At the end of this staircase is a door; upon entering it, turn right and you will find a locked door, which you can only unlock with the Key of Admittance, obtainable from one of the hidden Hogwarts secrets. The chest is inside this locked room, next to a stack of books.

From the Divination Classroom Floo Flame, go to the entrance beside the Floo Flame.
Pass through the wooden hall, taking a right as soon as you can to find an Arithmancy Door Puzzle.
Behind this door is the Arithmancy Classroom; pass through the hall and into the door to get to the actual classroom, then walk forward to another Arithmancy Door Puzzle. The chest is behind this door.

From the Faculty Tower Floo Flame in the South Wing area, walk forward into the Faculty Tower southwest, and enter the first door on your right (the door where Gladwin Moon taught you to use Alohomora with, if you already started his quest).
Take the stairs up two floors and unlock the Level 3 Locked Door.
Use Glacius on the fireplace in the room and enter it. Follow the path up and you'll find the chest by the table next to the brazier.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Dark Biome: Head back to the entry point and stand with your back to the gate, you will see a large piece of rock with a light to the west. You have to climb this rock and go to the end, where you'll find a tree trunk with some light. Here, you'll find the second Dark biome chest.

From the Bell Tower Courtyard Floo Flame, take the stairs on the left and enter the door in front.
Then, take the stairs down on your left and keep following the path until you see a Sleeping Dragon Statue on your left.
Once there, take a right and follow the path straight and enter the Level 2 Locked Door full of cauldrons on the side. You'll find the chest on your right by the table.
The chest is found after completing the Depulso Puzzle Room 2 in the Hieroglyphic Hall.

From the Trophy Room Floo Flame, go northwest and follow this curved path until you see a gate with a Level 1 Lock.
Enter it and keep following the path up; through a spiral staircase, a hallway, and another spiral staircase.
At the end of this staircase is a door; upon entering it, turn left and enter the stone spiral staircase up to the Headmaster's Office (requires completion of the main quest, The Polyjuice Plot). You'll find the chest on your left next to the door.

From the Central Hall Floo Flame, head up the stairs and out the large doors. Solve the brazier puzzle on the bridge to gain access to a ladder under the bridge.
There are two chests here; this one is at the left side, near the ladder.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Dark Biome: Compared to other chests, the final chest in the Dark biome is further away. You must first turn eastwards and jump onto the adjacent island. From here, turn north and head straight until you reach a mound. Climb onto it to reach a cave, where you'll have to first use Confringo to break a cobweb and then use Revelio to clear the fog. You will find the sixth Vivarium chest in Hogwarts Legacy inside this cave.

From the Faculty Tower Floo Flame in the South Wing area, walk forward into the Faculty Tower southwest, and enter the first door on your right (the door where Gladwin Moon taught you to use Alohomora with, if you already started his quest).
Take the stairs up one floor and you'll find the chest behind an Arithmancy Door Puzzle you need to solve.

From the Central Hall Floo Flame, head up the stairs and out the large doors. Solve the brazier puzzle on the bridge to gain access to a ladder under the bridge.
There are two chests here; this one is at the right side, at the middle of the tunnel.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Coast Biome: Enter the Coast Biome and head left (northwards) until you reach the first ledge. After climbing up onto it, head straight and then take the first right to find the seventh Vivarium chest.
The chest is found after completing the Depulso Puzzle Room 1 in the Library Annex.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Coast Biome: After collecting the first box in this biome, take a U-turn onto the beach and head eastwards towards the water. Across the water, you'll spot a rocky island. On it, you will see the elevation that's shown in the picture above. Climb up onto this island to locate the eighth Vivarium chest in Hogwarts Legacy.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Coast Biome: You must head north-west from the second Coast biome chest to find a cave. Inside, you'll find the final chest in this biome.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Mountain Biome: Head south-west after you enter this biome and climb up to three levels of elevation to find the first hidden chest in this biome.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Mountain Biome: Get down to the second level of elevation and then go left instead of forward. Once you descend from her, you'll find an arch of rocks as shown above. Go through it and head right to the end of the path to find the second chest in this biome.

**Note:** Does not count towards Hogwarts Collection Chests.

Mountain Biome: Exit the same arch that you entered through and head northwards towards the abandoned building. You must enter the building and go through its two entrances on the right. At this point, you may have to use some fire spells to break through the cobwebs. You can find the final Vivarium chest in Hogwarts Legacy here.

From the North Hogsmeade Floo Flame, take the brick path northeast and the first house you'll encounter to your right is a house with a Level 3 Lock (This house is directly across the house with a water mill). The chest is inside this house.
The chest can be found inside a Level 1 Locked Room at the topmost floor of the The Three Broomsticks.
From the South Hogsmeade Floo Flame, take the alley east to find a house with a Level 3 Lock. The chest can be found on the floor just before the stairs.
From the South Hogsmeade Floo Flame, take the stairs down due east and go to the house with a Level 3 Lock. Enter the house and go to the bedroom on the second floor to find the chest.
The chest can be found inside the Ashwinder Hideout beside Hog's Head. The hideout can be accessed during the quest, A Basis for Blackmail.
Can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp south of Pitt-Upon-Ford.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp south of the North Ford Bog Entrance Floo Flame.
From the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame, head for the Hamlet Shop, enter the house behind it and you'll find the chest to the right of the door upon entering.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp by the river west of the East North Hogwarts Region Floo Flame.
From the Aranshire Floo Flame, head for the Hamlet Shop and you'll find the chest at the 2nd floor of the house right of in front of the shop.
Can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp below another Bandit Camp northwest of the Northern South Sea Bog Floo Flame
Inside a small home near the Floo Flame.
Can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp east of the North Ford Bog Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp south of the West Forbidden Forest Floo Flame.
From the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame, enter the first house you see on the left with a Level 1 Locked Door and you'll find the chest behind a room divider.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp by the river south of the East North Hogwarts Region Floo Flame.
From the Aranshire Floo Flame, head for the flower shop in front and enter the small house with a Level 3 Locked Door. You'll find the chest on the right.
Can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp above another Bandit Camp southwest of Keenbridge Floo Flame
Inside aa house next to the Feldcroft Hamlet Shop to locate a chest on the ground.t
Can be found behind a level 1 Locked Door inside a house behind the Pitt-Upon-Ford Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside the Small Bandit Camp in the middle of the forest, located east of the West Forbidden Forest Floo Flame.
From the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame, take a right and you'll find the chest inside a small house near the outskirts of the village.
The chest can be found inside a Bandit Camp near the Korrow Ruins.
From the Aranshire Floo Flame, head for the house with flowers on it right across the Floo Flame. You'll find the chest just by the Level 1 Locked Door on the right.
Can be found inside a small shack west of the Keenbridge Floo Flame.
Can be found by some logs in Feldcroft
Can be found on the second floor of a house with crops and campfire in front of it. Located right beside the Pitt-Upon-Ford Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp next to a cliff, located east of the West Forbidden Forest Floo Flame.
From the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame, head straight, enter the second house on the left with a wheel in front and a Level 1 Locked Door, and you'll find the chest behind the table.
The chest can be found inside a Bandit Camp near the Korrow Ruins.
From the Aranshire Floo Flame, head for the small farm between the two houses on the left. Attack the rubble at the backside of the farm and you'll find the chest hidden there.
On the second floor of a locked house in Keenbridge
On the top floor of the house where you found the chest above in Feldcroft
Can be found on the second floor of a house with a level 3 Locked Door. House can be found south of the Pitt-Upon-Ford Floo Flame, just past the bridge with the "Beware Spiders" sign.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp on top of a cliff, located south of the North Ford Bog Entrance Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside a Medium Bandit Camp north of the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside the Korrow Ruins.
From the Lower Hogsfield Floo Flame, turn around and head for the second house you see on the left. You'll find the chest behind the Level 1 Locked Door to the left just by the door
Can be found inside a small room in Keenbridge
Can be found inside a level 1 Locked door inside a house northeast of the Irondale Floo Flame.
Can be found inside the house behind the Hamlet Shop south of the Pitt-Upon-Ford Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside the Horklump Hollow, located southwest of the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside a Medium Bandit Camp north of the Upper Hogsfield Floo Flame, near the Overlook Mine.
The chest can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp by the northern part of the region
From the Lower Hogsfield Floo Flame, head for the Hamlet Shop and face towards the nearby house. You'll find the chest at the back of the house by some crates.
Inside a locked house in Keenbridge
Can be found inside a level 1 Locked House west of the Irondale Floo Flame.
Can be found inside a Small Bandit Camp near a lake east of the East North Ford Bog Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside the Overlook Mine.
The chest can be found inside the Collector's Cave.
From the Lower Hogsfield Floo Flame, follow the road inside Lower Hogsfield past the two houses and you'll find the chest on your left by a broken wheelbarrow by the pond.
Can be found inside the Mine's Eye. The chest can be found behind some metal bars that can be destroyed by Depulso. Unlock the area by finishing the "It's All Gobbledegook" quest.
Can be found near the waterfalls northwest of the Irondale Floo Flame.
The chest can be found inside the Overlook Mine.
Found inside Mary Portman's Cellar. Access given from the Tangled Web side quest
